body:
### Hi there!

My name is Pedro Gaspar. I've recently finished my Master's Degree in Computer Science at Universidade de Coimbra. 

Currently, I'm working at at [Bundlr](http://bundlr.com) as a web-developer. Before joining Bundlr I helped around at [jeKnowledge](http://jeknowledge.pt), Universidade de Coimbra's engineering-centric Junior Enterprise.

### What I've been doing

#### At Bundlr

* [Bundlr](http://bundlr.com) (joined in 2011)
* [Tiny Cassette](http://tinycassette.com) (Codebits, 2012)
* [Matching Bags and Shoes](http://matchingbagsandshoes.com) (2012)

#### Other Stuff

* [Café Wifi](http://cafewifi.madeincoimbra.org) (Improve Coimbra, 2013)
* [O Que Falta em Coimbra](http://oquefaltaemcoimbra.pt) (2012)
* [jeKnowledge](http://jeknowledge.com) (2009)
* [jeKnowledge's project management tool](http://jeknowledge.pt/noticias/16/) (2009)
* Rádio Universidade de Coimbra's Information System (2009)

### Contact

You can reach me at me@pedrogaspar.com and on [twitter](http://twitter.com/pedrogaspar). Check out [the blog](http://blog.pedrogaspar.com) (sorry, haven't updated it in some time) for more social links.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Pedro Gaspar
